record.title: NAMING OF EMANCIPATION HALL
record.narrative:
NAMING OF EMANCIPATION HALL -- (Senate - December 06, 2007)

[Page: S15000]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to H.R. 3315, which was received from the House and is at the desk.

record.chair: The clerk will state the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 3315) to provide that the great hall of the Capitol Visitor Center shall be known as Emancipation Hall.
There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read the third time and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The bill (H.R. 3315) was ordered to a third reading, was read the third time, and passed.
